MultiFeature.Name: Precognition
MultiFeature.Text: By analyzing information around you, from subtle hints to seemingly disconnected facts, you learn to weave a string of probabilities in an instant that gives you extraordinary insights.

Feature.Name: Precognition - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on initiative rolls.

Feature.Name: Precognition - Precognitive Hunch (2 psi; conc., 1 min.)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you open yourself to receive momentary insights that improve your odds of success; until your concentration ends, whenever you make an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you roll a d4 and add it to the total.

Feature.Name: Precognition - All-Around Sight (3 psi)
Feature.Text: In response to an attack hitting you, you use your reaction to impose disadvantage on that attack roll, possibly causing it to miss.

Feature.Name: Precognition - Danger Sense (5 psi; conc., 8 hr.)
Feature.Text: As an action, you create a psychic model of reality in your mind and set it to show you a few seconds into the future. Until your concentration ends, you can’t be surprised, attack rolls against you can’t gain advantage, and you gain a +10 bonus to initiative.

Feature.Name: Precognition - Victory Before Battle (7 psi)
Feature.Text: When you roll initiative, you can use this ability to grant yourself and up to five creatures of your choice within 60 feet of you a +10 bonus to initiative.
